review: To start with I went to Dr.Brindha for my infertility issues.We were completely satisfied with her way of diagnosis and her focus in identifying our root cause of our problem . I took acupuncture sessions from her and that  had really helped my anxiety, depression , emotional stress issues . After each session, i felt absolutely amazing  and now after 7+ acupuncture sessions I would say it made me a better person both physically and mentally.Now I definitely believe in acupuncture and I recommend to everyone

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Brinda is amazing. She is extremely ************** professional and explains the problem at hand very well. She is also very kind and it is very easy to discuss all issues and situations with her.
